title: The Greatest ShowTrend 4/26: Wicked, Kamala Harris, Harvard, Bad Bunny, Lesbian Visibility Day, NBA
itunes:title: The Greatest ShowTrend 4/26: Wicked, Kamala Harris, Harvard, Bad Bunny, Lesbian Visibility Day, NBA
description:
In this edition of The Greatest ShowTrend, Jack and Miles discuss the film version of 'Wicked', Kamala Harris testing positive for COVID, Harvard 'atoning' for their role in slavery, Bad Bunny playing 'El Muerto' in new Sony/Marvel film, Lesbian Visibility Day, and NBA news.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
